body_html: This (and also test_requires) is for delegating python setup.py test to pytest: https://docs.pytest.org/en/latest/goodpractices.html#integrating-with-setuptools-python-setup-py-test-pytest-runner. I think it's fine to remove it because IIRC pytest doesn't really work in pytorch.
body_text: This (and also test_requires) is for delegating python setup.py test to pytest: https://docs.pytest.org/en/latest/goodpractices.html#integrating-with-setuptools-python-setup-py-test-pytest-runner. I think it's fine to remove it because IIRC pytest doesn't really work in pytorch.
body: This (and also test_requires) is for delegating `python setup.py test` to `pytest`: https://docs.pytest.org/en/latest/goodpractices.html#integrating-with-setuptools-python-setup-py-test-pytest-runner. I think it's fine to remove it because IIRC `pytest` doesn't really work in pytorch.
